descriptions.description: Unterstützung und gebräuchliche Operationen für das XPM-Pixmap-Format, welches gewöhnlich in älteren X-Anwendungen genutzt wird. XPM ist eine Erweiterung der einfarbigen XBM-Bitmaps, beschrieben im X-Protokoll.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=libxpm PACKAGE_VERSION=3.5.11
#oegimport libiconv #oegimport gettext
oegextract libXpm-libXpm-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz
mkdir -p "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/packages/${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}" cp AUTHORS COPYRIGHT COPYING README "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/packages/${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}/"
# no configure #configure.ac:17: error: must install xorg-macros 1.8 or later before running autoconf/autogen #configure.ac:17: the top level #autom4te-2.69: /bin/m4 failed with exit status: 1 #aclocal: error: /usr/bin/autom4te-2.69 failed with exit status: 1 #autoreconf: aclocal failed with exit status: 1
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --disable-rpath --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}"
mv bin/*.dll bin64/ rm -rf bin # TODO: Do we need to edit the .la files in lib64?
oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
